articles.summary: Inter wins 2-1 against Torino at the U-Power Stadium and thus wins the pass to the semi-finals of the Italian Cup.

articles.title: Italian Cup, Inter-Torino 2-1: Nerazzurri in the semi-finals
articles.summary: Inter won painfully and thanks to goals from Bonny and Diouf they went through to the round, eliminating a Torino team that tried to reach the 2-2 until the end but without finding the way to the net except with a goal disallowed for offside.

articles.title: Milan, Bologna is Ruben Loftus-Cheek's favorite victim in Serie A
articles.summary: As reported by Opta, Bologna is the team against which Ruben Loftus-Cheek has scored the most goals in Serie A (three). Last night the English midfielder put Milan ahead at the Dall'Ara in the 20th minute of the first half.
